name: Ronald Redd
text: Great Dive Experience with a great crew. Can't wait to go again.

name: Lynda Tiefel
text: Great crew, plenty of room on the boat, very organized.

name: Tim Dearman
text: I have now gone on charters with Captain Black for the past 4 years. He's very personable and knowledgeable and works hard to make sure that everybody has a great time. From communicating about weather conditions ahead of the trip, to cleaning the catch at the end of the trip, Captain Black provides a great experience for all.

resp.text: Thank you Tim. Always enjoy your company and guest!

name: Josh Parmer
text: Our family highly recommends Reel Attraction charters!!!! The captain was patient, fun, and personable. All 6 of us, both kids and adults had a blast! Captain didn't want to waist our time in spots that weren't hitting, and kept us all smiling the entire time!!! Would most definitely choose Reel Attractions again!

resp.text: Josh thank you for the review. I really enjoyed your group and hope to see you in the future. You guys stay safe!

name: Dylan Walters
text: Me and my 3 sons had a great time on our fishing charter with Captain Black. It was all business from start to finish. Limited on Red Snapper in about 30 minutes of fishing. We will be fishing with Real Attraction Charters again in 2018 !

resp.text: Thank you guys for fishing with us and really had a great time with your crew!

name: Vicky Bowerman
text: Very prepared and organized.  Had a great plan for catching fish. Very knowledgeable.  Would highly recommend him to others and will be booking with Captain Ron again.

name: Sam Bright
text: We did an all day trip! Morning trip out was incredible! Put us on some nice bull reds (big redfish) that put up a nice fight! Some of the guys on the boat had never been saltwater fishing and Captain Ron did an amazing job explaining all the different fish species and telling everyone about the gulf! We went back out on a afternoon trip to deep drop on some snapper and once again captain paid off! We pulled some slobs of snapper off a reef! I highly recommend using Captain Ronnie to take you fishing. As a local of the gulf coast he did an amazing job! Thanks Capt!

resp.text: Thank you Sam! Really enjoyed having you and your friends out. Also enjoyed having you help with retrieving the fish and thank you for the help keeping the boat clean. Call me anytime and we will do it again. Thank you!

name: Billy Daugherty
text:
Reel Attraction Charters & Captain Ronnie Black

Excellent experience with superb customer service!

If you’re going deep sea fishing in or around Ft. Morgan, AL and want to have a great experience and get your money’s worth, this is your charter! Our experience was worth this extended review.

Prior to this week, I had been deep sea fishing only once and that was on a “party boat” of sorts. It was an overall bad experience being on a boat with 30 or more people, lines all tangled up, people getting sea sick, etc.

My wife and I had a totally opposite experience with Captain Black. As a matter of fact, we booked and fished three separate charters with three separate companies during our week at the beach. While each experience was pleasurable, for the most part (come on – it’s fishing!), our charter with Reel Attractions was by far THE BEST overall charter experience. The customer service was second to none. From our initial phone call to discuss and schedule the charter, to the phone calls in the days and hours before the charter to discuss weather (Hurricane Nate), Captain Black was prompt, courteous, and patient with all our questions. He was at the dock waiting for us when we arrived (early). The boat was a perfect size with all the necessary amenities. He took time to explain everything to us. We didn’t want for anything. Captain Black was very attentive to our every need, he is very, very personable, he made every effort to make sure we were catching a variety of fish (and we did), he operated safely, and he did a great job cleaning our fish. Captain Black is a consummate professional and my wife and I highly recommend him and Reel Attraction charters.

On a side note, you don’t have to just take my word for it. Not only was our experience with him a stand out of the three experiences we had this week, but it was later validated when we took our haul to a local restaurant who will cook your catch for you. The restaurant staff was asking us about our experience and complimenting the variety of fish we had. Without us even saying his name, the waitress asked, “who did you go fishing with, Captain Ronnie Black?” You might have chosen a reputable charter when the locals attribute a successful catch to certain charters!

resp.text: Thank you for an awesome review!

name: Andrew Collins
text: Ron took my wife and I out on Wed 6-22-16 in the afternoon I caught 2 king mackerel and 3 keeper red snapper one about 8 pounds. Wife got sick and had to bring her back to the dock, Ron took me to fish in the bay, no luck. Over all very good trip! The fresh fish tasted Great!

name: Caleb Greenberg
text: We had a great time with captain Ron!!! He made the experience fun and made sure we caught plenty of fish. Would highly recommend him to anyone on vacation who wants a great deal and a great experience!!!

name: Chandra Stebbins
text: We had no trouble booking our outing with Capt. Ronnie initially.  However, on 5/29/2017, the day that we were supposed  to go out, there were storms off the coast and we could not.  OK,  we understand.  Capt. Ronnie said he would call around to a couple of his Captain buddies to see if someone could take us out on the  31st or June 1st, he never called us.  We had to call him...then he acted like he never heard of us.   Since our trip was cancelled due to weather we have not been able to get in touch with Capt. Ronnie for a refund of our deposit.  We are very disappointed in Reel Attractions.

name: Candice Myers
text: My husband and I had a great time and caught our limit on redfish. Couldn't be happier and will definitely book again!

name: elizabeth1228
text: Had a great time. Caught a lot of fish. Looking forward to the next fishing trip.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Buddy Lawson
text: Had a great day caught our limit.Ron Ron is a very knowledgeable and courteous and his boat is very comfortable to fish from.

name: Alex Moore
text: Had a Great time fishing ! Captain Ron did an excellent job putting us on fish early and often!

resp.text: Thank you Alex! Had a great time with you guys this Eve!

name: Jennifer Johnson
text: Had a wonderful time great people. Lots of help and gave us plenty of time.  Can not wait to go again.

name: Tye Santana
text: he put on on fish all day one of the best caption I have fished with

resp.text: Enjoyed your group. Thanks guys so much!

name: Melissa Oneail
text: Scheduled a trip out and the captain decided to cancel all trips for our day. We never heard from him. We still showed up and called him and he didn't even write us down on the books.

resp.text: Their was a miss communication and so sorry for that. I did offer a discounted trip for Friday. I'm sorry for the misunderstanding and hope to hear from you at a later date.

name: Richard Wright
text: 6 hour trip we caught 3 fish, very small, very expensive and won’t be using them again.

resp.text: Mr. Richard Wright I looked on our reservation book and do not see you as a guest. I rarely do 6 hour charters and if i do and the fish are not biting that day I cut them trips much shorter and prorate the charge. If you departed from Fort Morgan Marina you did not fish with us. I'm sorry you had a bad day when the fish were not active and if I can help you in any way feel free to contact me. 2514228665 Capt. Black.

name: Clare StackpoleMcGrath
text: it was breath taking awesome

name: Austin Jones
text: Captain Michael was great! I took my 6 year old daughter and she caught 15 fish by herself.

name: Jason Downard
text:
I have been on numerous charter trips and yes there are some competent boat captains  available and will likely supply an “ok” fishing experience for  you and your family but if you are  seeking a fantastic  trip with an exceptional
Captain  and Deckhand then you must go ahead and get booked on “Hooked Up”.  Me and my family, 6 total,  took a 6 hour trip targeting snapper we limited out  and moved on to other species. The deckhand works his butt off. Deckhand “Blake“  was like a little Tasmanian Devil on the deck. The Captain was so gracious and accommodating, my boys felt right at home on Captain Mikes beautiful Topaz. Captain and crew went out of there way to show my peeps a wonderful time. Lots of laughter and  new memories made on this trip. We had a blast. I hope anyone that books based on my review has a wonderful time like we did. We will be booking with these guys again. My wife is also posting a review as you check out our collective pictures you can tell we had lots of fun and did a lot of clowning around. Just look at the size of this king. Lol 😝

name: John Limbaugh
text: Mike has a great boat. He just bought it this winter. It's not brand new but it's in top shape.i can't wait to go fishing and catching soon.

name: Michael Shockley
text: Hooked Up! Putting fish in the boat with Captain Michael! Good times & great guy!

name: Paul Wimmer
text: Had a great time with Mike tons of fish Stand up Guy!!!! Awesome

name: Bob Rutledge
text: Great fishing with Michael as usual. We been going out for years. This year we caught red snapper!

name: Chris Aliment
text: Had a great time with Captain Michael last week with an offshore charter with some friends! This man knows loves to fish and knows how to catch them. We caught our limit of very large Trigger fish and lots of bee liners. Had a great experience and would recommend him to anyone looking to have fun going fishing offshore!

name: Caroline Jackson
text: Captain Mike and his awesome deckhand, Blake, offered us one of the best weekend's we've had fishing here in Orange Beach. Captain Mike was just as eager as we were to catch some good fish, and that is exactly what we did the entire time! We limited out with no problem after he continuously took us to spots where the fish were biting. Both Captain Mike and Blake were on top of everything all day long, making it easy and also relaxing for us. The boat was beautiful, clean, and comfortable, but their company was the best of all. If you're looking for a fishing guide that won't let you down, Hooked Up Fishing is the only way to go. I highly recommend booking with them, and truly hope my family and I get to fish with them again one day.

name: Patrick Grose
text: Went out today with Captain Mike and his deck hand Blake. This was my wife’s first ever deep sea fishing experience and it was phenomenal!!! We caught plenty of red snapper and my wife caught a small bull shark (she thought it was Jaws!).  Mike and Blake were great to fish with and very professional. I would highly recommend Hooked Up Charters for your next fishing experience in Gulf Shores!!!

name: David Beery
text: First class experience,  had a great time and caught plenty of fish. Laid back, easy going, and professional

name: lisa downard
text: I have been on several fishing charters but this was by far the BEST experience we have ever been on.  Captain Michael Thomas and deck hand (Blake) went out of their way to make it a perfect day.  They put us on the fish immediately.  If we spent a few minutes with no bites he was quick to move us to a better spot.  The deck hand (Blake) was so attentive.  Us girls never had to touch bait or wait for bait.  He was always ready and we kept him very busy.  They were fun to spend the day with even if we hadn’t caught fish.  When it was time to head back in the captain saw a spot with great potential for Mahi-mahi so he had us drop some lines.  My boys were sooo excited to catch mahi-mahi, king mackerel and lots of red snapper.  We will definitely go on this boat again!  Worth every dollar!

name: Quentin Kepfer
text: If you're considering fishing in the gulf it doesn't get any better than an outing with Mike and his fabulous deckhand! Mike went above and beyond our very high expectations. He personally took the time himself to ensure that my special needs son got his BIG snapper. We cant wait to get back and do it all over again.

name: Jesse Gruny
text: Awesome time, went today 3-19-20 am trip.  caught a  bunch of mangrove snappers and 6 sheepshead.  Went on inshore 4 hour trip.

name: Kourtney McCord
text: The best trip I've been on in a long time! We had a BLAST & caught some good fish! I HIGHLY recommend Hooked Up Fishing Charters! Orange Beach, AL

name: Ed Watson
text: Hooked Up Fishing Charters was great!  Captain Michael and his deck hand Blake were awesome!  They put us on the fish and we brought home a bunch of Snapper!

name: Marshall Malone
text: Great experience. Michael knows his stuff. Great for inexperienced fisherman. We enjoyed everything and caught lots of fish.

name: Blake Strawn
text: Went out this past Thursday and got our limit on snappers. It was tuff fishing as the seas were rougher than expected but capt Mike worked hard trying to keep us on the fish. Our next trip will be with him hopefully with better sea conditions lol.

name: Michael Thomas
text: We love to introduce kids to saltwater fishing

name: Shan Payne
text: Went out with Mike Thomas again this year he runs a great charter service and no doubt he is going to put you on the big snapper Made some great memories with my son and friends this year Looking forward to booking with Mike again next year Also this year he has added a first mate great young man and a hard worker

name: Tracie Morse
text: Captain Michael hooked us UP! Thank you for a great day and for your incredible "fishing hole" knowledge, for sticking with us to get our limit, for helping us reel them in, and for cleaning our catch so we could have a delicious dinner! You're the BEST!  HIGHLY recommend!

name: Jackie Fogel
text: My family and I contacted Captain Mike for my dad’s 60th birthday and the trip couldn’t have been better. My dad is a very hard man to impress, and we are already discussing our next trip! Mike was knowledgeable and extremely fexible and a pleasure to spend the day with. I would definitely recommend booking your trip with him.

name: Bill Willis
text: Captain Mike had us on the snapper right away on opening day this year. Every man limited out...then he put us on some fun fishing holes. Boat full of fish. Will be eating fish until opening day next year!

name: Bob Driscoll
text: Micheal Thomas did a great job putting us on fish all day long.  At the end of the day everyone was worn out from reeling in fish.  Great day on the Gulf with Captain Micheal.

name: Scott Young
text: Capt Michael definitely hooked us up!  Awesome all the way around!  He is driven to get your fish in the boat!  My go to charter for sure!

name: Jason DoreyMD
text: Last summer I caught a 35lb Red Snapper with Capt Michael Thomas with Hooked Up Fishing Charters. Besides a great trip he is a nice guy.

name: Matthew Cammack
text: Cap’n Michael knows how to have a good time and put you on some fish!

name: Jeff Lear
text: I've fished with Capt. Michael many times and I've never seen anyone who enjoys fishing as much as he does! Makes for an enjoyable day and we ALWAYS catch fish.

name: Sara Olivencia
text:
We went on the pirate cruise and it was so much fun! This was our second time on the cruise  and I would highly recommend it.

My kids 4 and 8 love it! The pirates are really friendly and talkative with the kids. The kids get to play lot of water games to stay cool.

There is very little shade. Wear sunblock and bring a couple cold bottles of water with you.

name: Patrick O'Connor
text: Phenomenal! Great Captains and Deck Hands. LOADS of fish. Take the 6 or 8 hour trip if serious about fishing. Take the 4 hour if you just want a boat ride.

name: Colton Sweeney
text: 4 hour fishing trip was actually not even 2 hours of fishing. They told us to be there 30 minutes early (7:30am) but we didn’t leave the dock til 8:30am. Took an hour to get to the fishing spot. We were constantly moving, so we couldn’t even let our bait sit for fish to get it. Don’t think anybody on the boat caught anything worth a picture. Cherry on top was when it took an hour and a half to get back to the dock. I’m not sure why but we were going the speed of smell. Only reason they get two stars is because the crew was nice.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback. We will try to improve our performance in future.

name: Ron Sheffey
text: Not family friendly.  Crew used language not appropriate for children and did not want to help children or anyone . Bathroom was ridiculous for all! Captain had own agenda and did not consider passengers even with several very seasick.

name: Floyd Middleton
text: You'd like to go deep sea fishing I suggest you take this trip with these guys any one they got everybody's friendly and the captains put you on the fish great experience thank you

name: Sherry Stout
text: We had a great time.

name: Just V
text: Decent time.  Have been on many fishing trips. This was first time we didn't catch anything.  Deckhands said the captain was still in training.

name: Johnny Fuller
text: Had a fun trip.could use something to get your cooler back and forth from boat.its a long way  to get to boat

name: Jill McCowan
text: Even tho we got soaked on our tour and had to cut it short, it was still enjoyable.

name: Amy Jo
text: We had a great time on our dolphins cruise. The caption and deckhand were friendly. The kids had a blast and the views were amazing. The kids even had a water fight with pirates.

name: Jessica Standley
text: The dolphin cruise was amazing! Captain Jason and Brad did such a great job finding us dolphins and made sure that everyone had a great experience. 10/10 would recommend!

name: David r
text:
Water was very scenic. Crew member complimented my socks. Felt like a fisherboy. Saw a beer can and a styrofoam cup.

We also fished. Very enjoyable. Would recommend to a friend.

name: Kim Smyly
text: Great, helpful staff.  Captain was very good!

name: Angie Stiel
text: My fist time out on a fishing charter boat.  I loved it. Honestly didn't think I would enjoy it but when I reeled in my first tiny fish and then hit my monster fish I was hooked. The crew was very helpful and friendly. Shout out to first mate Jason and the other two crew members that worked their butts off to make sure we had a great time. Thanks to the captain for our safe return to dry land. I had a deal with my dad that I'd go but I was not touching any bait or fish lol. So yep I had a great time and best thing was I didn't even chum up the Gulf.  Dad holding my monster fish.

resp.text: Thank you for fishing with Hudson Marina!  We are glad to hear you had a great trip, and congratulations on your catch.  We appreciate your business and the time you took to leave a review.  Come back again soon.

name: Chad D
text: Friendly deck hands, very knowledgeable. Better if we would have caught more fish, but that's the way fishing goes sometimes. We took the 4 hour party boat deep see fishing service.

resp.text: Chad, thanks for the review and joining us. Hopefully the next time you join us the fish will be in a biting frenzy.

name: Rodney Ford
text: Waste of money be better off brim fishing

name: Robert M. Puig
text: I had an awesome time :) Great food, sights, he let us drive the boat. What a great time for a good cause too

name: mikey lemaster
text: One of the best places to fish that I have found. Our party limited out on Red snapper and the C.A.T. Captain and crew were great.

resp.text: Mikey, thanks for joining us on the C.A.T. We can’t wait to have you on board with us again.

name: Hannah Horohoe
text: The dolphin tour was a huge waste of time and money. We were asked to arrive early to prepare for the tour. At 3pm they had us walk down the dock to the boat, but did not allow us on the boat for twenty minutes and would not tell us why. After burning in the sun, they took us out to the gulf to see what we could spot. The captain would shout out dolphin “facts” over the intercom to keep us entertained. One of them being, “dolphins can get up to 10 tons.” The crew had us yell and clap at the dolphins when we saw them. I do not believe dolphins like to be catcalled since they would flee from the boat. I have done another dolphin tour in orange beach in the past. We should have returned to them. Overall, I do not recommend.

name: Amanda Rich
text: Absolutely everything I wanted and more! The crew was awesome! They helped make sure all of the kids got to reel in some good fish! Everyone in my party of 6 got to catch we had a blast!

name: bamababe75
text: We were supposed to be on the C.A.T.  but got bumped to a party boat. The Explorer.   They could not find  fish.  Worst fishing trip ever!  Deck hands were super nice but not very knowledgeable.  Definitely not worth $150.00!  I went on the Wishbone last year and it was amazing!  That was what I paid for this year but t was horrible! Never again!

name: Bryan degroot
text:
My boat engine died after towing it from Michigan with plans to fish with family. Obviously that plan changed, and we decided to fish from a party boat. Something I normally would not do, as experience has taught me that this is usually a low likelihood of success fishing trip, where little effort is put into ensuring a good shot at catching fish. Imagine my surprise, when we fished with Captain Dan aboard the Explorer. What a difference! The Captain put us on fish, and knew when and where to move to keep the action consistent, and stayed out a bit longer than planned to ensure everyone had a good shot at a catch. The crew, from First mate Jason to Julie, Steve, and Ashton, the entire team was first rate. They were fun, lively, VERY helpful and worked hard to keep lines in the water and made sure everyone was attended to, with bait, and fish removal as well as quickly fixing tangles, and kept everyone fishing.
By far the hardest working, and most attentive crew in Party boat fishing.!! Top notch. Thanks for your efforts!! I would recommend this group to anyone. Coming from our group of 10. Ranging from kids and 1st timers to experienced anglers, we all had fun.
Highly recommended trip.

resp.text: Thank you for your business and for leaving a review.  We are glad you had a great trip and appreciate the compliments you left for the captain and crew. We hope to see you again soon.

name: thomas lynch Jr
text: Fun place to go to see dolphin and for kids they have a pirates boat to

name: Lauren Schanz
text: The cruise and Captain was great.. The captain did an awesome job telling and showing us things about Orange Beach on top of seeing the dolphins. My family and I enjoyed watching the Dolphins. $10 a person is a great deal til have a to pay for an infant.. $3 a piece for can soda, water, chips and cotton candy absolutely ridiculous. Office staff could be a lot more friendlier and helpful. Three staff members and they couldn't even help find suitable life jackets for the children and infants. Couldn't find one infant life jacket so had to find the smallest child life jacket. They just sat there talking to each other and on the computers..

name: shelby leblanc
text: Sitting at the beach and Saw a boat that said Dolphin Tours, Hubby and I decided why not go on one. Best $12 ever spent. Got to see some dolphins, got to have some drinks and snacks! The bartender was super sweet as well as our tour guide, she has AWESOME recommendations for places to eat with the best views. Very cute family owned Business!

name: gary dollar
text: Best dolphin cruise I've been on. The operators were super fun and they made sure we saw dolphins of course but were super engaged with the whole group. Would definitely recommend.

name: Sara Benningfield
text: Well worth the money!! We had so much fun. We saw lost of dolphins and he was very informative about the cruise and what was going on. Also the co-captain Jason did an awesome job with the kids and keeping them interested and showing them where the dolphins were. We will be back!! Thank you for such a relaxing dolphin tour!!! 🐬🐬🐬

name: Mike McCravey
text: Took the family for a fishing trip while on vacation and had a wonderful time! We didn't catch much, but we had a few fish for dinner that night. The captain and crew were awesome and the boat was wonderful as well. For my first time out deep-sea fishing, this was a great experience.

name: Ashley DeBord
text: Had a great experience this evening on our dolphin tour. Even though we didn't see many dolphins, the crew made every possible effort to give us a great experience. Thank you!!

name: Christy Lewis
text: Thank you for a wonderful fishing adventure.  The crew was very attentive and personable.  We would recommend this trip/adventure to anyone who was looking for a fun adventure in the Gulf Shores/Orange Beach Area. 😀

resp.text: Thank you for booking with Hudson Marina!  We glad you had a great time fishing,  and thank you for the time you took to leave a review.  Come back again soon.

name: susan rice
text: We had a great experience! Caught lots of fish on our trip. Crew was friendly and helpful. Had an added on bonus with a dolphin jumping out of the water putting on a show right next to the boat.  Jedidiah... fish on!!!

resp.text: Thank you for fishing with us! Congratulations on your catch.  We appreciate your business and hope to see you again soon.

name: Adrienne Williams
text: Was a nice boat ride of the gulf and orange beach. Crew were very nice and knowledgeable of the surroundings. Saw a few dolphins and they made every attempt to show us them!

name: Eddie Ledkins
text: Deckhanded on the boats there last season. Good Captains and crew. Best prices on 4 hour deep sea fishing trips.

name: art moyer
text: Worst trip I've ever been on one of the mates was sea sick and the captain could not find the fish and out of 30 people only 6 fish longest was 16"

resp.text: Art, we apologize for it being a rougher day on the water and for the bite being slow that day. Hopefully next time the seas are calm and the fishing are biting

name: Kirstin Fullenwider
text: Highly recommend this place. Jason and Corbit were a lot of help and made this fishing trip one of the best I've ever had! Can't wait to come back next year!

resp.text: Thanks!  We love to hear great things about the crew!  We are glad you enjoyed the trip and hope to see you again soon.

name: adam quick
text: We were told to be there early because the boat was leaving at 7:30 well it was well after 8:00 when we finally left and everybody was catching good fish untill the captain wanted to keep moving, then one of the deck hands kept moving everybodies fish around and nobody knew where their fish were and there was some big fish that couldn't be found do to the deck hand swapping our buckets around, but due to leaving the dock late our trip was cut short. Other than that it was fun and we had a pretty good time I guess, deck hand todd was awesome and he deffently knew what he was doing

name: Kelly Standley
text: Had a great time on a four hour morning party trip. Every one in our group had a catch. Some with as many as 5-6.

name: Tabitha Freeman
text: I want to thank the captain and crew for making one of my sister dream come true she was diagnosed with stage 4 cancer  with only 6 to 12 months and although she was very sea sick they did everything to make sure she caught some fish and she said even though she got sea sick she would do it again  love them for  them making her feel great

name: Joe Eaton
text: Great boat ride. seen several dolphins playing. Crew was great, Captain was awesome, with the history, and knowledge of the area and dolphins as well

name: aften giles
text: Only saw like 2 dolphins while other dolphin cruises was going out not the ocean but not this one he did circles and pretty much didn’t go anywhere except the bay very disappointed

name: Daniel Alexander
text: I was highly disappointed in this cruise being I had gone deep sea fishing with the same company the day before and had an absolute blast. However this was not the case on the Dolphin cruise. Trouble started as soon as we boarded the boat. As we walked up the stairway to the upper deck to view the dolphins there were no benches or any permanent seating just the cheap white lawn chairs you buy at Dollar General. This not such a big deal but very in professional looking. Second of All as soon as we sit down in our lawn chair we noticed there were way to many people on the upper deck for the amount of chars provided. This was due to the lower deck witch is enclosed and air conditioned smelling like raw sewege. We not talking about a little stick, it was so bad not one person could stay inside and by the end of the trip the smell was leaking out of the lower deck and was ingulfing us on the stairway outside on the boat.This was my chief complaint just due to the fact I have 3 small children that use the bathroom a lot and I was having to go in and out of this stink a lot!! Also could have seen more dolphins from the beach and we had got a lot more close to the dolphins the day before fishing. It was hour into the trip before we seen a dolphin 200yds away.  People save your time and money huge let down on the dolphin Cruise. But the deep sea fishing trip is great.

name: Terry Hammond
text: Captain was pleasant and good with the kids. Even let them drive the boat. However didn’t see many dolphins.

name: Nik-Nik Pat
text: So sorry we we were running a little late Captain!! We had a  wounderful time.The water was beautiful and the dolphins were amazing.We saw one doing flips out of the water,he was for sure showing off.We will be back to bring the baby when she’s older.Godbless.

name: matt mansfield
text: Great experience even on a choppy day, the crew was very helpful and went above and beyond to make sure everyone (especially the kids) had a great experience

name: Justin Blair Fishing
text: Started out good saw dolphins then headed towards the inlet and open water and the captain went down stairs. Boat stopped and idled in the inlet for a good solid 10 minutes then when he came back we turned around and cruised the inlet then went back 2 stars only because we saw dolphins early on in the cruise after that nothing

name: Stefanie Miller
text: Capt Rodney and Porter were great. We saw some beautiful dolphins including a baby. Great time for the whole family.

name: Christina Conn
text: Great price and we saw tons of dolphins. The boat ride was very smooth too.

name: Drew Hysong
text: We had a great time and everyone should have caught at least one fish.  They were biting.

resp.text: Thank you for fishing with Hudson Marina!  We are glad you had a great time and appreciate the review you left.  We hope to take you fishing again soon.

name: Steve Fuller
text: The boat broke while we were out, so we stopped for a while to fix, then went unreasonably slow moving spot to spot.  Captain tried to pass the slow speed off as trolling, but it was unproductive as only 2 fish were caught in hours of trolling.  Nobody on the boat was satisfied with the their experience.

name: Kenny McCallister
text: Pirate ship adventure was a Great family trip! C.C. was awesome!!

name: Quan Nguyen
text: We had good time with captain Dan and his crews on the explorer

resp.text: Thank you for fishing with Hudson Marina!  We appreciate your business and the time you took to leave a review.  We are glad you had a great time and hope to see you again soon.

name: J C
text:
My husband and I are Snowbirds from Canada and we enjoyed a delightful voyage on the Perdido Queen at the Hudson Marina on February 22, 2017.

The lunch was delicious!  There was ample food for everyone!

Chicken, pork, salad, mashed potatoes, pasta, grilled vegetables, dinner rolls and strawberry bread pudding!  There is a bar onboard and you can enjoy an alcoholic beverage with your lunch.

Compliments to Chef Jonathan!  Two thumbs up!

It was a very smooth ride and we enjoyed seeing the sights!

The Staff is very professional and polite and assisted the passengers boarding and departing the Perdido Queen.

We will recommend the Perdido Queen to our American Snowbird friends!

resp.text: Thank you for cruising with Hudson Marina!  We are glad you had a great experience, and thank you so much for taking the time to leave a review. We hope to see you again soon.

name: Kelsey Sims
text: Worst dolphin tour I’ve ever been on. Captain complained over speaker the whole time. Took us to the end of the bay and said he wasn’t going any further because of waves. We literally sat there and watched other dolphin boats pass us to go out. Saw two dolphins fins. That was it. Paid $60 for 4 people for nothing. After tour, spoke with captain about how disappointed I was. He didn’t care. Called and spoke to manager and they were rude to me. Waste of time. Do not go on this tour. Choose a different company!

name: James Dennis
text: Caught my limit plus 2 big ones Jason really took care of all of us

name: Angel Reavis
text: Best dolphin cruise

name: Mark Waters
text: A one one thing.  We saw dolphin and nice landscape but overall not a highligt of summer.

name: Maddison Leonard
text: Really fun saw lots of dolphins

name: Judy Johnson
text: The  food on the valentine's  cruise  was disgusting.  Don't  waste  your .money.

resp.text: Thank you for your business.  We strive to provide each customer with an exceptional experience and apologize if you did not enjoy the activity.

name: Craig Hare
text: You will spend most of your time riding and not very much time fishing. Save your money and go to tje state park pier.

resp.text: Thank you for your business.  We apologize for any inconvenience you experienced.  It is our goal to provide each customer with an excellent experience.

name: Denisa Berry
text: Very enjoyable.

name: Michael Brown
text: They will cancel on you!!!!

name: Phil Berry
text: Amazing experience

name: Adrian Salas
text: Love it!

name: Charlie Anderson
text: Best Dolphin Cruise in Gulf Shores! Captain Joe is fantastic! We got to see the dolphins up close and get some fantastic pictures!  Our 4 year old had a blast! It was her first time on a boat and Captain Joe made it the best experience for her. He even taught us all how to fish. Now my daughter is hooked! Pun intended:)

resp.text: Thank you for the review! Happy to hear your little one is hooked!

name: Erica Miller
text: My family had the best experience with Capt. Joe. If you are thinking about booking, do it! This was our first time for a fishing charter, and it was awesome! Capt. Joe has an unmatched positive energy! He is family friendly and has insurmountable knowledge! He seemed genuinely interested in us learning, as well as catching fish! We will be back!

resp.text: Thank you! We appreciate it!!!

name: Kevin Hartell
text: The family and I took a dolphin sight seeing cruise with Captain Joe. Keeping a 3 and a 1 year old entertained isn’t the easiest, but he came through with flying colors. He made the ride smooth for my baby, was educational, and we found the dolphins! I think we had 5 or more all around us, and one was a baby. We were surrounded. And Captain Joe went above and beyond the whole time, I cannot recommend him enough. The trip was worth every penny.

resp.text: Thank you for choosing Island Marine Charters!!

name: Jonathan Terry
text: From the time I booked a trip with Island marine charters for myself and a friend to the end was nothing less than a great experience.  We arrived at the boat launch early and the boat was already in the water.  Captain Joe was very professional and definitely family friendly.  We communicated several times before the trip and he did not fill our heads with unattainable expectations but far exceeded what we expected.  I have fished with many guides for many years and this is one I will keep on my list anytime I am in the gulf.  Thank you for a very memorable experience and looking forward to the next trip.  Looks like I will see you mid June!

resp.text: Thank you! Looking forward to your next trip!

name: Lauren Hawthorne
text: Captain Joe was truly the best!  He was so incredible with our 8 year old and was just a genuinely nice person.  We all had such a great time and ended up catching 3 personal bests!  He even took some extra time to show our daughter the dolphins up close!  Can’t wait to go fishing with him again!  You’re missing out if you don’t choose him for your next charter!

resp.text: Thank you!!!!

name: Karan Khosla
text: Our first fishing excursion and Captain Joe was amazing.  Went with small kids and they had a memorable experience. Thank you so much Captain Joe until next time…

resp.text: Thank you! Glad you guys enjoyed the trip!

name: Kevin Hartell Jr
text: I cannot recommend Captain Joe enough. We took a 3 year old and a 1 year old on a dolphin cruise, and he went above and beyond. He made the ride smooth for my baby, was entertaining, and was very educational. I think we had 5 dolphins and a baby within 50 yards of the boat on all sides and even had a breach! Highlight of our trip and worth every penny. Captain Joe will be my first call next year for a fishing trip, for sure.

resp.text: Thank you for the review! See you next year!

name: Nathaniel Freeman
text: Me, my dad and brother in law went inshore fishing with capt. Joe. It was a great trip we caught a lot of fish and capt. joe was awesome.  We have fished with many different guides for all different kinds of fishing and he was no doubt the best.    Hope to get to go back with him again.

resp.text: Thank you for the review! Looking forward to future trips!

name: Ana M
text: Capt Joe is the best! He really cares that his guests have the best experience possible. We'll be recommending him to everybody and will call him the next time we're in town!

resp.text: Thank you! Love hearing happy clients!

name: Tony Noel
text: We had a great time with Captain Joe.  Captain Joe is a lot of fun, very personable, and goes out his way to make sure everyone on board has a good experience.  We came at a time when the fish were transitioning making the fishing a challenge.  Captain Joe worked hard to put us in a position to catch fish.  I will definitely book another charter with Captain Joe the next time we are in town and I would recommend him to anyone who plans on spending some time in the Gulf Shores/Orange Beach area.

resp.text: Thank you!!!

name: Julia Spangler
text: We had a great Family Fun trip with Captain Joe yesterday. In two hours, each of us caught at least one fish (our daughter caught multiple), and we also found a pod of dolphins that swam alongside our boat. It was amazing to see the dolphins so close-up while they were jumping and playing. Definitely recommend to any family with an interest in fishing or marine life. Joe can customize the trip to focus as much on fishing or on dolphins as you like. We spent an hour on fishing and an hour on dolphins.

resp.text: Thank you!!!

name: Aaron Smith
text: I booked a charter for me and my two boys (16 & 10) during our trip to Gulf Shores and it did not disappoint. Captain Joe was fantastic! He was personable, informative, and patient. Not only did we catch a bunch of fish (and a crab!), but we learned some tips and tricks along the way. If you are thinking about booking, don’t hesitate!

resp.text: Thank you for the review! We appreciate it!

name: Heath Bush
text: Captain  Jo is a phenomenal guide that works hard to find fish and make sure you have a great time.  My family will always use him when we are in town.

resp.text: Thank you! We appreciate it & look forward to having you & your family on the boat again!

name: Amanda Schmidt
text: Had the most amazing experience today fishing with Captain Joe. He was very welcoming and knowledgeable. Made the salt water fishing trip unforgettable for us. Lots of laughs and great conversation. We were able to catch and release some awesome fish and we saw a bunch of dolphins. Definitely recommend and will be back again!

resp.text: Thank you for choosing us!

name: Angie Pentland
text:
Captain Joe is flat out a good dude.  After searching charters/reviews for a couple of days, we knew the moment we spoke with him that he was the guy to take our family out.  He put us on fish right away and we caught fish in every spot we stopped.
We were interested in seeing dolphins, so Joe pulled lines and made a run to another area where we had dolphins playing right next to the boat.
Joe is fun, knowledgeable and easy to talk too.  We will be giving him a call again the next time we are in the area.  We highly recommend him.  Thanks for a great day on the water and making memories our family will never forget.

resp.text: Thank you for the review!!!

name: Carlton Dove, PGA
text: Captain Joe is an outstanding guide! We had an awesome trip with him.  We caught fish, had great conversations and lots of laughs.  You can count on him to get you on the fish and to have a good time.  A great trip for a couple buddies and/or a family. Captain Joe is a true professional.  Enjoy!

resp.text: Thank you!!!

name: Matthew Fullen
text: We had an incredible time with Captain Joe! He was the utmost professional, knowledgeable, and he had a great sense of humor. He contacted me a few days before our trip to confirm our expectations such as: species to catch, trip duration, and scenery. We caught 25-30 sheepsheads, Joe butchered them with expert precision, and we kept a few for dinner that night with family. I would recommend him to anyone and we will be back.

resp.text: Thank you! Looking forward to next time!

name: Ashley Ramm
text: Our family had a great trip with Captain Joe!!  He was really patient with the kids and made sure they caught plenty of fish.  We were also able to cruise around and see some dolphins.  He definitely helped us make some great memories.  Highly recommend!!

resp.text: Thank you!!!

name: Jason Stob
text: Had a great afternoon with Captain Joe!  Took my son and I out for an afternoon fish and had us on the fish from the moment we started until we were done.  Fished multiple species, had nice tips to keep us catching them.  Helpful and fun to talk to.  Would fish with Captain Joe anytime!

resp.text: Thank you!!!

name: Chel Horn
text: Joe was a great guide!!!! Lots of knowledge, friendly, family oriented and fun to be with. Our time went so fast and we caught so many fish. We can't wait to come back and go again. Thank you so much Captain Joe Fish!

resp.text: Thank You!!!

name: Nic Mertz
text: We had an great trip with Captain Joe! We caught a bunch of fish big and small, and saw some dolphins! Joe was really patient with our 10 year old and taught him (and us) a lot of different techniques and fishing tips which we will apply throughout our fishing endeavors! Thank you Joe we will be back without a doubt sir!

resp.text: Thank you!!!

name: Tera Fullen
text: My husband, brother-in-law, and cousin went on a chartered inshore trip with captain Joe on 30 Dec 2020. They had a fabulous time! We ate the fish they caught that night and their experience was all they talked about for the remainder of our trip.

resp.text: Thank you for the review!!!

name: afuzybear
text: Captain Joe was great! Kept working the area til he put us on some big bull reds. Such a great day. Highly recommend  Captain Joe. Great guy who has great local knowledge of where the fish are.

resp.text: Thank you!!!

name: Sara Pedersen-Fairfield
text: Hands down the best fishing charter I have ever been on.  We came with 4 adults at all difference experience levels and Captain Joe had insane amount of patience with our group.  I still can't figure out how he was in 4 places at one time!  We got to try several different fishing styles and he made sure we were all catching fish all day!  Only regret was not bringing our kids with because Captain Joe would have made it an adventure for them.  We are already planning our next trip so we can take our kids fishing with Captain Joe!!!

resp.text: Thank you for the review!!!

name: Randy Wilkens
text: Joe's service was top notch! Very experienced and pleasant. Caught a lot of fish- at one point we had a triple going! (3 fish at once). I strongly recommend his service and he's reasonably priced vs the big competitors. Great times and memories made. Did excellent with my young kids. Thanks!

resp.text: Thank you!!!

name: Chris Pozzuto
text: Simply the BEST!  If you are looking to do a 4 hour fishing excursion in Gulf Shores, look no further than Captain Joe!  My group has been on many fishing charters and this one was the best, bar none.  Captain Joe is very knowledgeable, personable and put us on the fish!  Will definitely look him up again when we are in Gulf Shores.

resp.text: Thank you!!!

name: Susam Ford
text: There aren't enough stars to rate how wonderful Captain Joe and his charter service is. We took our ten year old granddaughter out and we had the best time imaginable. He's is wonderful with children! He found her interest right off and had great conversation with her. He made sure she caught plenty of fish. Words cannot express what a wonderful time we had. We will definitely go again when possible. Loved,loved, loved it!!

name: Joe Miles
text: Had a great fishing trip, Captain Joe is the best!!

resp.text: Thank you!!!

name: Cliff Meyer
text:
What a great trip! My 8 year old son and I did a 4 hour in shore charter with Captain Joe. My son had a great time and caught quite a few fish. We even caught a huge Black Drum estimated at 30 pounds! Captain Joe was great with my son, he kept him fishing and educated both of us on the different species of fish we caught. He really went above and beyond to make the trip fun and informative. We kept two fish to eat and he cleaned them for us as well.
His boat and equipment are all top quality and ready to use. There was zero downtime to worry about.
Even the local bait and tackle shop we visited knows him and highly recommended him again for future visits. We are already talking about planning our trip again next year!
Thanks again Captain Joe!

name: Nana Up North
text: Captain Joe is the best! We had an amazing trip where we had dolphins playing all around our boat plus Captain Joe worked so hard to make sure we caught fish even though it meant going to several different spots and took extra time.  He is very committed to making sure you have an enjoyable, successful fishing day and is engaging and knowledgeable.  He was patient with a first-time-ever fisherwoman!  I would highly recommend him!

name: Ryan Gambrell
text: Captain Joe is hands down the best. He communicates very well prior to the trip. We emailed several times before the trip and he called the day before to let us know where to be and what to expect. On the charter, he seemed genuinely interested in getting to know our group, he (of course) knew where the fish would be. He really enjoys his job and wanted us to succeed, offering advice and tips and tricks to help us Ohioans catch some seafood without being overly aggressive about it. We had a great time and I would do it again in a heartbeat. Highly recommend.

name: Sheila Fort
text: Captain Joe, the best Captain on the Island! Joe is very energetic, great personality, has a great boat & equipment! This Captain is on top of his game! My husband and son caught fish and had a fantastic time!  Thanks for giving them a great experience!

name: Scott Adams
text: Great time and awesome fishing! Doing it again next year!

resp.text: Thank you!!!

name: Zachary Ervin
text: Joe was awesome. We had weather issues all day.  It was our sons 11 birthday and he did everything in his power to get us out on that day. We went out at a very unorthodox time of day when the fish typically are not biting but he put us on a spot that even at that time of day the kids caught nearly 40 fish. He did a great job communicating and keeping us posted on the weather. We are already planning our next fishing trip and will definitely use him again.

name: Henry Pham (HenryFromOhio)
text: Alabama Inshore Fishing is the place to go if you’re looking for a personalized fishing experience in Gulf Shore, Alabama. Me and my dad went on a father son fishing trip and had a great time on this charter. Captain Joe was very personable and knowledgeable and created a fun/educational experience on his boat. He is the only captain in Gulf Shores that has a money back guarantee if you don’t catch any fish on your trip, this however didn’t happen as we caught many Black Drum and Redfish on our trip in the middle of December. So if you’re looking for a charter that guarantees plenty of fish, is fun/educational, and has a captain that will go above and beyond to make sure that you’ll have a great fishing trip then Alabama Inshore Fishing is the place for you.

name: Heidi Morgan
text: Can't say enough good things about Inshore Marine Charters. Captain Joe worked with us to find a good option for both our small kids and the adults. He knew exactly where to find the fish, both big and small, took time to get to know our group, took time with the kids to teach them about the fish, educated all of us on fishing safety. We caught tons of fish and a shark! Thank you Captain Joe!

name: Stoney Jones
text: Captain Joe is top notch! You will not find anyone better, so stop searching, hit the call button and book this guy. Joe will put you on the fish in any weather condition. I will definitely be back soon for another round Joe!

name: Anthony Allen
text: Best fishing, best captain, and best experience I've had in over a decade of coming to this area! Captain Joe is the man and he makes sure all of his clients have the best service possible. Thank you again!

name: Ryan Smith
text: This guy is very good at his job.  He can find fish in any conditions.  He grew up on these waters and impressed the heck out of myself and my buddy.  Highly recommended!!!

name: Marlo Mikle
text: We had a great time with Captain Joe!  He took us right to where the fish were biting.  He was very knowledgeable and advised on proper technique when fishing.  We will definitely use Captain Joe again!

name: Steve Bond
text:
My party recently booked Captain Joe to take us for an inshore fishing trip. To say that it was a success would be an understatement! We had a very productive and fun-filled morning of quality fishing (I captured the Inshore Slam within the first hour of the fishing trip!).

Captain Joe is a skilled angler and is also passionate (he really cares) if his clients are into quality fish. I highly recommend his services as a great value  both for the money and entertainment!
God Bless,
Steve Bond

resp.text:
Steve,
Thank you for the review! It was a great day on the water with you guys! I look forward to fishing with you again!

Captain Joe
www.islandmarinecharters.com

name: Al Katzone
text:
We had a wonderful fishing trip with captain Joe and his son. Both were really thoughtful and sympathic. We got a lot of sheepshead and saw some dolphins jumping, too. It was the highlight of our USA trip! Thanks alot and best regards from Switzerland,
Rüdiger and Mareen

name: Joshua Parson
text:
Captain Joe was an excellent guide who took the time to show us proper technique and land us on some pretty nice fish.

Hes a really genuine dude and I'd book him again if I came back.

name: Jonathan Straus
text:
Great experience.   Captian Joe worked all week to fit us in with bad weather and high winds and kept us informed through out. He is a great teacher of the proper way to fish.  Took my three boys ages 7/7/4 and he did an unbelievable job getting them excited but also doing things the right way.  Book in advance but worth it for sure.   My boys want to all ready book another trip.  Overall top notch experience and can't thank Captain Joe enough giving my sons this experience.

Jon from Indiana

name: Mark Meckem
text: Captain Joe is an awesome person and very knowledgeable.  Thanks

name: Rebecca Worthen
text: This guy was awesome! He goes above and beyond to make sure you have a great fishing experience. Very instructional and fun.

name: Derrick Thomas
text: Great trip! Capt. Joe put some fish in the boat. Very knowledgeable and great conversation. Obvious he takes pride in what he does just by how well he takes care of his gear and his boat. Highly recommend Island Marine Charters.

name: Byron Jones
text: Known him (Joe) for over a decade and still does the same work and has the same care for his customers as he always has. You should go by and see his work. I know they say a picture is worth a thousand words, but to see it in person, would amaze you. Great work!!!

name: Kim Baumann
text: All I can say is WOW! He is a 7th generation fisherman and really knows his stuff. Took our group of 5 including a kid. Joe's personality definitely made the trip.  He went above and beyond and made sure our entire group had fun. We caught some real whoppers! Also saw dolphins, several sea turtles, a manta ray and an osprey with a mackarel dinner! Highly recommend!

name: Michael Sain
text: Capt Joe will put you on the fish. Had a great time fishing with him.

name: Gene Montecchie
text: Nobody gives attention to detail like Joe.  Very impressed with his work!

name: Tony McDonald
text: Excellent Captain!

name: Mike
text: Rates too high

resp.text: Michael, I appreciate your feedback, but I would like the opportunity to find out why you feel our rates are too high. We are very competitive in our market. We clearly state our rates on our website and never accept payment until after our services have been completed and our clients are happy and satisfied. The only thing that makes sense is that perhaps you have confused our business with someone else's, or you were not comparing us apples to apples with our competition. In that case I would like to respectfully ask you to remove the negative review. If you would like to talk to me personally, I can be reached at 251-228-2344. Thanks, Joe Buskens

name: Stephen Salinas
text: Captain Don and Amy did an amazing job with our trip.  We joked that my family had a curse preventing us from catching fish on prior fishing trips. They made it their mission to break the curse… everyone caught multiple fish, my daughter caught her first fish and the biggest one of the day even my hard to please teen had a blast. And to top it off we were even able to see dolphins which my wife loved. Thanks for an awesome trip and memories we will have for years to come.

name: Elise Jorenby
text: We choose to do the family combo. I booked the charter a month before our adventure and was so happy with the service. We saw dolphins up close, went fishing ( my kids all caught fish with in minutes!) And went swimming on a private beach. Captain Ty was so knowledgeable of the area and made us feel right at home. Booking was easy, finding the dock was easy, and everyone there was so friendly. I would highly recommend this for any family or group!

name: Caleb Rose
text: My family and I had such a good time using this charter!  They were friendly, extremely good with the kids, and very motivated to make our time with them the most fun we could have.  Book with them and you won't go wrong.

name: THE joseph
text: Awesome trip! My wife, our two young children and their grandma went on the fishing tour. Everyone caught a fish including our almost 3 year old! We even got to see dolphins up close! Great trip and awesome people running the boat.

name: Douglas Phillips
text: an amazing experience for our party of 4 adults & 1 child!  we did the sunset/dolphin cruise on easter. captain don was friendly & amenable to all of our requests. we spent at least 15 minutes idling while dolphins swam around us.  for anyone on the fence, THIS is the private charter to book for a small group.  highly satisfied!

name: Travis Henning
text: Captain Ty was awesome! Great guide and great with my kids. Highly recommend him.

name: Shayla Zumach
text: We had an absolute blast fishing with AmyLeigh and Don! Not only did everyone catch fish, but their company was unmatchable. They were very helpful and extremely sweet people. Don over heard us say we wanted to see Dolphins, so he actually went out of his way to find some - and he didn’t disappoint! I highly recommend booking, we will be visiting them again in the future!

name: Rhegan K’mari
text: I just want to say that it was so so so so SO much fun. I went with some family/friends and we had an amazing time. We got to see so many dolphins and look at the beautiful sunset!

name: heather mcleod
text: We had an amazing time on the sunset cruise! Definitely breath taking views! Our family of 6 really enjoyed the relaxing boat ride to our selfs and had a good a captain. We even seen some dolphins! Good value great time!

name: Erica Myers
text: We went on a three hour kids fishing excursion. Don and Amy were very nice and we enjoyed our trip! We caught some fish too!

name: Beth Toothman
text: Very nice!! We did the 3 hour family trip and loved every minute of it!! Our captin was wonderful!! We caught fish and even saw some dolohins!! Will definitely recommend them!!

name: Mallori Corder
text: Captain Don was awesome!! I highly recommend this sunset dolphin tour! He was so knowledgeable of the area and incredibly friendly! The dolphins were so close we could almost touch them! We are looking forward to taking our little girl on a kid fishing trip with him next summer!

resp.text: Thank you very much.. enjoyed y’all

name: R Romero
text: We had a great time last summer on the dolphin/sunset cruise with Capt Don.  It was our best dolphin cruise ever!! Captain Don was great! We saw lots of dolphins! The sunset was amazing to see.  We will definitely book another cruise this summer.  I highly recommend Capt Don if you want to have a good time!

name: Stacy Browning
text: Great time on the Blue Angels excursion!!!

name: A. G. M
text: Captain Don was great. He was very personable and gave a lot of information on things to see while on vacation in the area. We saw several dolphin up close and had a great relaxing boat ride. Took our 3 year old son who also enjoyed the private cruise.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Diana Barber
text: We just finished our dolphin sunset cruise.  It was great.  Captain Don was so friendly. The boat was very nice.  We saw some dolphins and the ride was amazing. The whole family enjoyed it.  We have taken dolphin cruises before but this was the first private one.  I will take the private one from now on.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Lisa Eiseman
text: Unfortunately we scheduled our trip with TripAdvisor and the reservation was not seen by the company.  We were able to get a refund, but would have loved to have gone on our private tour.  Make sure you confirm with owner and don't have an incorrect time given to you by a third party booker.

name: Nicholas Riche
text: Truly amazing experience!  On our ride we came so close to so many dolphins and the views were beautiful!  Capitan Don was so friendly and made the experience memorable! This was the best part of our stay in Orange Beach!  We would definitely recommend and we will be back!

name: Bill Smith
text: Had a great time!!!  Nice clean boat.  Private charter is the way to go!!! The Captain Don is the man to see for your charter needs.  Very informative and fun to talk with.  Would love to go on the fishing charter and the Blue Angels charter next time I'm down here.  Thanks for your time Captain Don!  We'll see you again!!!

resp.text: Thank you

name: Ernal Mouton
text: I've known Captain Don for over 20 years. So, naturally when we vacationed in Orange Beach, we booked a dolphin tour with him. Captain Don was very professional, competent and concered with our comfort and safety.  We thoroughly enjoyed the tour. Our grandsons can't wait until the next trip!

name: Kimberly Crowley
text: Very peaceful and relaxing boat tour. We saw several dolphins and the kids loved it. Captain Don is awesome, full of info and super nice. Highly recommend this private charter!!!

name: Yolanda Connor
text: Captain Don with Gulf Island Charters gave us an awesome private tour aboard C'est la Vie to see the dolphins swim! He truly did not disappoint and was true to his word! My grandson absolutely loved it!

resp.text: Thank you

name: Driftwood Beards
text: Captain is a good guy and it’s a nice boat but not the trip to take for catching fish... at least the inshore fishing we had planned. Was looking for some good Redfish or Trout fishing - next time we will save the money and fish from bankside. If you aren’t from here, learn from our lesson and spend the extra money to go offshore! Definitely review the actual website for the information... we signed up through a booking agency who didn’t give us all of the correct information.

resp.text: Thank you and sorry that you are disappointed. The trip you booked on my website is a kids trip that is a short inexpensive trip designed for young kids to catch fish and is the only inshore option that I offer online booking for...due to the nature of these trips this is a ((catch and release )trip as stated on my website and I thought I made that very clear the day before I talked to you on the dock. I told you exactly what kind of fish we would catch so kids would get great experience catching fish and that is what we done.thank you again and if I can help you in any way please let me know.

name: Mary Jane Womack
text: We had a fabulous trip with Captain Don in the fall. He is dedicated to making sure everyone on board has a great trip. Can't wait to go out again!

name: Monty Smith
text: The trip was fabulous!! Saw lots of dolphins and the kids loved it!! Highly recommend!!

name: Margo Juengling
text: We all had a great time. The kids loved it...

resp.text: Thank you very much

name: Leila Boudoin
text: We had a wonderful time and can’t wait to go back!

name: Tim Johnson
text: Great trip! Showed us some really great sights.

resp.text: Thank you very much.. enjoyed having y’all

name: Angela Smith
text: We took our 6 and 7 year old boys out and saw so many Dolphins! We had a great time 🐬

resp.text:
Thank you and glad
y’all enjoy the cruise

name: Tracies Raggette
text: We have used this charter company last summer!! Had an awesome fun filled vacation! Would highly recommend them to everyone!

name: Laura Howard
text: Went with my friends! It was so fun!

resp.text: Thank you very much..

name: Andy Hargrove
text: Great trip with Capt. Patrick!  He was great with my 8 year old, put us on the fish, and made sure we had a good time.  I will definitely book again if we head out to Mobile Bay!

name: Eric Wittig
text: Captain Patrick did an awesome job listening what we wanted to catch on our trip and putting us on a load of fish. The morning definitely flies by when everyone is catching fish and you get to land some fish on a variety of tackle setups. I would highly recommend Ugly Fishing to anyone who is taking a trip down to the coast! Book now, you won’t regret it.

resp.text: Thank you sir for the review and for the business. It’s a real joy for me as a guide for anglers to be able to experience a variety of fish and or tactics. You and your dad did fantastic and I hope to be your guide again in the future.

name: Jamie Lindsey
text: Captain Patrick is awesome.  We had been on 5 trips with him and we always have a great time and catch lots of fish.  His wit and wisdom make the trip very enjoyable

name: Davina Hood
text:
Love our trips out with Captain Patric! He put us on some good fish to catch. We have booked 2 trips with him to date and for sure will book when we come back again. Captain Patric has us spoiled to fishing, which is only made better by family competition!
I definitely recommend using Ugly fishing LLC. This is definitely a new family favorite that our kids look forward to! Thank you for such a great time !

resp.text: Thank you so much for continued business and for the awesome review! It’s a real pleasure to be your family’s fishing guide and I absolutely love the competitive nature.

name: Bryan Viles
text: Captain Patric is a class act. He put us on the fish! We  connected with multiple trophy sized speckled trout! Definitely the guy to call if you’re in the area and looking for an excellent fishing experience.

name: Daniel Barbier
text: I highly recommend Capt. Patric if you’re in the Mobile Bay Area and want to catch fish. I was on a family trip in Dauphin Island and wanted to make a solo trip to try and find some bigger speckled trout and we did just that.  Within 45 minutes of leaving the dock, I had a 22” we each had a 20” in the boat along with some others that were in the 15-18” range.  Overall I was very pleased with the trip, Capt. Patric was very knowledgeable and the boat was really nice.  I’ll definitely be giving him a shout next time I’m in the area. Thanks again Patric!

resp.text: Thank you for the review Daniel! It’s my pleasure to have put you on the fish you were after. I hope you enjoyed your trip to South West Alabama. Please give me a shot again in the future.

name: George Moore
text: This was the best inshore charter. The boys wanted  to catch Shark and man we caught them. Two fifteen year old boy slept good that night.

resp.text: Thank you for the review and for the business. It was a real pleasure to serve y’all. The boys were very appreciative of everything which makes my job that much more rewarding. I hope to guide y’all again in the future.

name: Todd McGarrity
text: I have fished with Captain Patric multiple times and have a great experience every time. He is knowledgeable and fun to hang with but most importantly - you can tell he LOVES what he does. Can’t wait to fish with him again soon!

resp.text: I like that I’m fun to hang with 😁! Thank you for the review Todd. I look forward to y’all’s next trip to Mobile Bay.

name: Marc Nations
text: The day fishing with Patrick was great. He put us on fish quickly and took care of us all day. He knows his stuff and he made sure that we knew how to fish successfully. I highly recommend him as a Mobile bay fishing guide.

resp.text: Thank you for the review and thank you for choosing me to be your fishing guide. I hope to be your guide again in the future

name: Victor Menoni
text: Fantastic experience. Patric was very courteous and knowledgeable. Put us right on the fish. Nice haul of redfish and speckled trout. Highly recommended.

resp.text: Thank you for booking and for the review! I hope to be your fishing guide again in the future.

name: Vic Wiggins
text: I took my son and grandson Sheephead fishing with Patric and we couldn’t have had a better experience. Patric is extremely knowledgeable and really makes the trip a lot of fun. He put us on the fish immediately and we caught a lot of really nice Sheephead. We all had a great time ! I will definitely be booking another trip with Patric later this year. He’s the best !

resp.text: Thank you for the review Vic. It was a pleasure to show y’all a small portion of the Alabama Coastal fishery. Thank you for booking and I look forward to our next trip.

name: Shane Taylor
text: 20 stars if it would allow it. Our family had a great fishing trip with Captain Patric. We had a family of 5 and his boat accommodated us very well. He worked hard taking us to several spots to get us on some fish. We were able to keep 38 sheepshead and 1 spotted trout.  I really respect how he will meet you at the boat launch that gives us the best shot at catching fish for the day. He's now our choice of charter while visiting the beach. Absolutely will be booking again soon. Thanks Captain Patric for a great day on the water.

resp.text: 20 stars would be awesome and I’d give y’all a 20 star review for being awesome customers! I am looking forward towards our trip you scheduled in March.

name: Beard Face
text: Great fishing trip. Patrick knows where the fish are. We had a great time.

resp.text: Thank you for the review. It was a great pleasure to be your fishing guide today.

name: Cawthon
text: If you want to get put on the fish, Capt Patric Garmeson is the guy.  Already looking forward to our next trip!

resp.text: Thank you Cawthon! I too will be looking forward to our next outing. Thank you for the return business and I will be anxiously awaiting the new baby photos

name: Patrick Bane
text: We had a great father/son trip!  Captain Patric is very knowledgeable and great with kids!

resp.text: Thank you for choosing me to be your fishing guide and thank you for the review! You and Hutton did great! I hope to guide y’all again on future trips.

name: MIKE Stanley
text: Great Captain Chris very personal good guide will come back!!

resp.text: Thank you for booking with us Mike. I’m great full we were able to get Capt Chris to help us with your group.

name: Tommy Lauderdale
text: We always have a great time fishing with Captain Patrick After several years of fishing with him I can say with confidence that you won’t go wrong going with ugly fishing. We always have a great time

name: Chris Stano
text: Had a great time out with Capt. Patrick and we caught fish the whole trip. If you are ever in the Mobile area I would recommend you reach out to him to plan a trip.

resp.text: Thank you for the review and for booking with me. I hope to be your guide again some day.

name: Susan Jernigan
text: Had the best day catching trout and sheephead today!! Highly recommend Captain Patrick and Ugly Fishing. First time for trout, catch 8 and had fun with this big sheephead!

resp.text: Thank you for the review Susan! It was a real pleasure to be your fishing guide and to net your fish! Its an honor to know that I guided you to your first speckled trout 😁

name: larry bailey
text:
Been going fishing with Captain Patrick for four years now. Sometimes twice a year. Never disappointed, and have a blast. Best fishing guide around, and I’ll
Never use anyone else. We come from KY just to fish with him. He’ll put you on the fish and it’s an experience you’ll never forget or regret!  You want a fishing trip of a lifetime? Then plan a trip with Captain Patrick @ Ugly fishing !!

resp.text: Thank you for the review and for the repeat business. I always enjoy guiding my Kentucky guys! Till next time my friend!

name: Tim Gentzlinger
text: Captain Patric of Ugly Fishing in Mobile Bay Alabama is a top notch fishing guide. He put us on a redfish bite like I have never seen before. He completed my quest to catch a redfish in Alabama within the first 5 minutes of the trip. Very knowledgeable of the area and a pleasure to fish with. Can’t wait to get another day on the water with him. Once again thank you for the memorable day on the bay. Fish on brother 🔥

resp.text: Tim, it was a real pleasure to be your fishing guide. You have know idea how happy I was to be the guy who put you on your first Alabama redfish. Thank you for booking and I hope you can do it again sometime.

name: Greg Pridgen
text: CPT Patric got us on the fish early and kept us on them all day.  He’s very knowledgeable of the area and was fun to be around.  We were able to land a few big Jacks in addition to a few nice Reds, some Specs and White Trout....  we even got an unexpected flounder.  Definitely plan to book him again in the future.

resp.text: Greg I really appreciate the review! I love a nice mixed bag day like y’all had. Thank you for your business and I hope to be your guide again some day.

name: Gail Moore
text: What a great fishing trip with Captain Patrick. Early we caught so many speckled trout we lost count. While we were doing this Tom and George each caught a big bull red. Then it was off to look for more redfish which we found and caught. Captain Patrick was so helpful with instructions and giving us different baits and lures to try when the bite would occasionally slow down. What a fun day. We will definitely book with Captain Patrick again.

resp.text: Thank you for the review Mrs. Gail! It was a real treat to be y’all’s fishing guide for the day. I hope to see y’all again.

name: Chris Gurner
text: I have fished with Ugly Fishing for several years now and can say that every year the experience is top notch. If you are looking for a guide service that knows where to fish and how to fish you’ve found it with Patric.

name: Bill Meadows
text: Had a blast fishing for trout, sheephead  and flounder with Captain Patrick. It wasis a very cold day and he didn’t hesitate to take us fishing and show us a great time!

resp.text: Thank you for the review but most importantly thank you for booking with Ugly Fishing! We aim to please 😃

name: Brandon Davenport
text: Had a blast fishing with Capt. Patrick was awesome. I’m not much on fishing but hooking into those jacks was amazing! Never thought I’d have as much fun or stay as busy on fish as we did both days. Going to try and get out there again next year for sure.

resp.text: Thank you for the review Brandon! It’s always a pleasurable day on the water with my boys from Kentucky! I’m pumped the jacks were so cooperative and those snapper were awesome as well!

name: Ian Bjuro
text: I have been fishing over a handful of times with Patric. He is by far the best and most knowledgable guide in the Coastal Alabama area. He will put you on fish!

resp.text: Thank you for the review Ian! Most importantly thank you for the return business!

name: Jacob Chandler
text: I can not say enough good things about Capt Patric Garmeson and Ugly Fishing Charters. Over the last few years my family and I have been on several trips with Patric and not once did we come back without smiles on everyone’s face.  Capt Patric has a true love for his profession and it shows through the knowledge he freely shares with his guests. If you are considering trying Ugly Fishing I suggest you book early because his schedule stays packed!

resp.text: Thank you for the review and the continued support. You are correct I absolutely love my job and the fishery I get to guide on. I love taking the boys fishing but it was nice to actually be your fishing guide this last time around. Till next time my friend.

name: Jacob Chandler
text: I can not say enough good things about Capt Patric Garmeson and Ugly Fishing Charters. Over the last few years my family and I have been on several trips with Patric and not once did we come back without smiles on everyone’s face.  Capt Patric has a true love for his profession and it shows through the knowledge he freely shares with his guests. If you are considering trying Ugly Fishing I suggest you book early because his schedule stays packed!

resp.text: Thank you for the review and the continued support. You are correct I absolutely love my job and the fishery I get to guide on. I love taking the boys fishing but it was nice to actually be your fishing guide this last time around. Till next time my friend.

name: randy white
text: Very knowledgeable of the Mobile Bay.  Taught me techniques and tactics that I didn’t previously utilize.  Highly recommend for anyone from beginner to expert in inshore fishing.

resp.text: Thank you for the review and for booking with me. I hope to see you again either as a customer or on the water using the techniques you learned.

name: Marshall Short
text: It got real ugly out there!  He got us on to some monster reds! Patric was great! He has the best boat we've ever been on as well.

resp.text: I love the review! Yes it did get Ugly! Ugly in a good way. Thank you for your business and I hope to be your guide again some day!

name: Chris Graves
text:
Patric kept us busy from the time he picked us up until the time he dropped us back off.
Couldn't have asked for a better day or trip.  My 10 year old son hasn't stopped taking about the 12 foot hammerhead shark!  Highly recommend taking a boat ride with Patric. We will be back.  Thanks again!!

resp.text: Thank you for the review! It was a real pleasure guiding y’all on the Gulf. The hammerhead is certainly the highlight of my summer as well.

name: Forrest Meeks
text: My family had a great time fishing with Patrick. Conditions weren't favorable for snapper so he put us on the trout and redfish. He was awesome with my 3 girls ages 9 to 15. Two of which had never been out a charter trip.

resp.text: Thank you for the review and most importantly thank you for choosing Ugly Fishing. The girls were awesome, polite and coachable! It was a real pleasure to guide you and your family on Mobile Bay.

name: Mark Sabol
text: Captain Patric was outstanding, he was patient with the kids, taught the adults a few new things and most importantly, we caught a lot of fish.

resp.text: Thank you for your review Mark. Most importantly, thank you so much for your business!

name: T Tat
text: Patrick is absolutely the best guide! We took my 5 year old nephew with us, he spent the day helping him so we could fish. Caught a bunch of fish, Patrick was very informative and knowledgeable in the different species. Great gear, great guide, great time, cannot wait to get out on the water with him again

resp.text: Thank you for the review. I really love my job which many people can see my passion when we are on the water. Thank you for the kind words.

name: Justin Williams
text: Had a blast with Patric. Highlight of the trip was definitely the hammerhead!! Will book again!!

resp.text: The hammerhead was a highlight of my career! As an inshore/nearshore Captain I don’t carry tackle big enough to handle a shark of that size. It was awesome! Thank you for booking and the awesome review!

name: Dan Walsh
text: Fantastic trip.  Knowledgeable and friendly guide.  Will hire again.

resp.text: Thank you for your review and thank you for choosing me to be your fishing guide.

name: gary roberts
text: We been out with Captain Patric a couple times he always put us on the bite. The last time we went to a natural gas rig, there were multiple boats fishing we had the only boat catching fish. We limited out on red snapper then went after redfish. Captain Patric is very knowledgeable and makes fishing a great experience for everyone. I wouldn't use anyone else for my fishing trips

resp.text: Thank you for sharing your experiences. Y’all are a pleasure to guide and it’s an honor to be your only guide! Thank you for the repeat business and I look forward to our next outing. And thanks for stopping by to say hello at the baseball field it was good to see you!

name: gary roberts
text: We been out with Captain Patric a couple times he always put us on the bite. The last time we went to a natural gas rig, there were multiple boats fishing we had the only boat catching fish. We limited out on red snapper then went after redfish. Captain Patric is very knowledgeable and makes fishing a great experience for everyone. I wouldn't use anyone else for my fishing trips

resp.text: Thank you for sharing your experiences. Y’all are a pleasure to guide and it’s an honor to be your only guide! Thank you for the repeat business and I look forward to our next outing. And thanks for stopping by to say hello at the baseball field it was good to see you!

name: John Christian
text: Had a great trip with Patric and highly recommend. Patric is extremely knowledgeable and works hard to ensure his clients have a great experience. I can’t wait until our next trip!
